item.latestTitle: An original bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 269.

item.latestTitle: An Act to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

item.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the deduction for local lobbying expenses.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the deduction for local lobbying expenses.

item.name: Introduced in Senate
item.text: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the tax deduction for lobbying expenditures to influence the legislation of any local council or similar governing body, including an Indian tribal government.

bill.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the deduction for local lobbying expenses.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
